The Hunger Games is some type of rhetoric for If you're hungry, EAT Sh!T American dumb@$$es. Kids watch this crap, then think they know what LOVE is. I also love the "Cold as a dead  bone" attitude. Depression isn't because of lack of resources, its because of a lack of MENTAL resources. Holly's basically taken a concrete TURD in the shape of a baseball bat, to beat to a pulp what it presumes is my 2 cell powered brain. I pay enough to my ISP per month, which I consider payment to this junk anyway. If a movie or game is truly good, I pay for it, and consider it my gratitude. The whole schenanigans they show in the beginning of the movie, about how hard those people work, the lighting, staging, etc etc blah blah, they all got paid. Don't try to make me feel sorry for them. If I work an hourly job, I get paid by the hour, and so do they. The product is no longer important, the marketing is what sells TURDS. I can sell TURD if I market it right. I am angry, I lost 1.5 hours of my life.

Overall, best quality rip I have ever seen. Well done to this uploader. Usually rips lack the strength of the immersive surround sound experience on my high end 9.1 system, but not this one. Audio was superb and picture quality was very close to direct play from Blue Ray disk. As with any rip which has been compressed, the images are ever so slightly muted to the discerning eye, but hardly noticeable, even on a 58" samsung plasma.
